guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for citalopram and CYP2C19

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 19

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166308322

text.html: "Celexa [citalopram] 20 mg/day is the maximum recommended dose in CYP2C19 poor metabolizers due to the risk of QT prolongation." See label for more information.

implications: CYP2C19 poor metabolizers have higher systemic concentration and adverse reaction risk (QT prolongation).
